Texts.Chs: 尝试建造一些更有用的工作台，比如极其有用的^orange;物质萃取器^reset;。^orange;加工台以及它的升级版本^reset;对于^orange;每一个FU中的工作台^reset;都是必须的。让它发挥最大功效吧。
Texts.Eng: Try building a few more basic goods such as the extremely useful ^orange;Extraction Lab^reset;. ^orange;The Machining Table and its upgrades^reset; are necessary for ^orange;every FU crafting station^reset;. Use it well.

Texts.Chs: 你已经在^cyan;Frackin' Universe^reset;的探索中迈出第一步了。有了^orange;加工台^reset;你可以建造出许许多多种类的^orange;科研工作台^reset;，也能够^green;合成资源^reset;，让我们通过制造^orange;电磁铁^reset;来入门吧。
Texts.Eng: You've taken your first steps in ^cyan;Frackin' Universe^reset;. With the ^orange;Machining Table^reset; you can now branch out into a wide assortment of ^orange;Lab Stations and Equipment^reset; as well as ^green;crafting resources^reset;. Let's start by making an ^orange;electromagnet^reset;.
